form.congress: One Hundred Thirteenth Congress of the United States of America
form.enrolled-dateline: Begun and held at the City of Washington on Friday, the third day of January, two thousand and fourteen
form.current-chamber: IN THE SENATE OF THE UNITED STATES
form.official-title: To extend temporarily the extended period of protection for members of uniformed services relating to mortgages, mortgage foreclosure, and eviction, and for other purposes.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the Foreclosure Relief and Extension for Servicemembers Act of 2014.

section.header: Temporary extension of extended period of protections for members of uniformed services relating to mortgages, mortgage foreclosure, and eviction
section.text: Section 710(d) of the Honoring America's Veterans and Caring for Camp Lejeune Families Act of 2012 (Public Law 112–154; 126 Stat. 1208) is amended—

paragraph.text: in paragraph (1), by striking December 31, 2014 and inserting December 31, 2015; and
in paragraph (3), by striking January 1, 2015 and inserting January 1, 2016.

attestation-group.role: Speaker of the House of Representatives
Vice President of the United States and President of the Senate
